title: Quercetin ameliorates ox-LDL-induced cellular senescence of aortic endothelial cells and macrophages by p16/p21, p53/SERPINE1, and AMPK/mTOR pathways.
abstract: Atherosclerosis (AS), a chronic inflammatory disease of the arterial wall, remains a dominant cause of death and disability globally. Quercetin has been evidenced to be effective against AS, but the exact mechanisms are still largely unclear.
